HTTP Notification Failure for SIM140909-5522-96212S - 09/09/2014 16:35:33, GMT

Error Message: POST https://www.simpris.com/sub.php/confirm/auto

If you login to SpringBoard, click Notify in upper-right, then click Notification Issues, you can see all failed notifications, view details of the error to help debug any script/server problems you may be having, and delete or retry the notification.

If you need further assistance, please submit support request via the support link in the control panel.
